org.apache.spark.scheduler.cluster

Class CoarseGrainedSchedulerBackend

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.scheduler.cluster.CoarseGrainedSchedulerBackend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutorAllocationClient, Logging, SchedulerBackend
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoarseMesosSchedulerBackend, SimrSchedulerBackend, SparkDeploySchedulerBackend, YarnSchedulerBackend

    public class CoarseGrainedSchedulerBackend
extends Object
implements ExecutorAllocationClient, SchedulerBackend, Logging
    A scheduler backend that waits for coarse grained executors to connect to it through Akka. This backend holds onto each executor for the duration of the Spark job rather than relinquishing executors whenever a task is done and asking the scheduler to launch a new executor for each new task. Executors may be launched in a variety of ways, such as Mesos tasks for the coarse-grained Mesos mode or standalone processes for Spark's standalone deploy mode (spark.deploy.*).
